title: BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Says Completed Bookbuild For Offer Of Commbank Perls XII Capital Notes
text:
BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Says Completed Bookbuild For Offer Of Commbank Perls XII Capital Notes

Stock Markets 57 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 18:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Says Completed Bookbuild For Offer Of Commbank Perls XII Capital Notes Oct 11 (Reuters) - Commonwealth Bank of Australia : * SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED BOOKBUILD FOR OFFER OF COMMBANK PERLS XII CAPITAL NOTES * ALLOCATED A$1.25 BILLION OF PERLS XII ON A FIRM BASIS UNDER BROKER FIRM OFFER, AND MARGIN HAS BEEN SET AT 3.00% P.A.

BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Says Completed Bookbuild For Offer Of Commbank Perls XII Capital Notes
description: BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Says Completed Bookbuild For Offer Of Commbank Perls XII Capital Notes
